pages.text: At this time, due to not all overworld islands having been completed, $(item)snow/$ is hard to come by. The only place you will be able to get it is the $(l:overworld/04_taiga)taiga island/$. During rainfall and above an altitude of 128, snow will accumulate on blocks.$(p)Thankfully, once you have your first $(item)snow blocks/$, a $(thing)snow golem/$ will provide you with more than you'll ever need.

The adorable $(thing)snow golems/$ can be created by placing down two $(item)snow blocks/$ with a $(item)pumpkin/$ carved using $(item)shears/$ on top.$(p)Next, you can create $(item)ice/$ by compacting the blocks in a $(item)basin/$. And creating $(item)packed ice/$ is easy too - just $(l:basics/05_fan_crafting)splash/$ it with an $(item)encased fan/$.$(p)$(p)$(italic)Ice boat roads, the best invention for traveling around since the EATS road! Probably.
